references.paper_title: Certified adversarial robustness via randomized smoothing
references.reason: This paper introduces the core concept of randomized smoothing for certified adversarial robustness, a foundational work for the topic discussed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Certified robustness to adversarial examples with differential privacy
references.reason: This paper provides a crucial method for certified robustness using differential privacy, a closely related concept to randomized smoothing and important for the analysis in the main paper.

references.paper_title: (de)randomized smoothing for certifiable defense against patch attacks
references.reason: This work extends randomized smoothing to address patch attacks, a significant development that the main paper references and builds upon.

references.paper_title: Boosting randomized smoothing with variance reduced classifiers
references.reason: This paper proposes improvements to randomized smoothing, directly compared and contrasted with the techniques developed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Input-specific robustness certification for randomized smoothing
references.reason: This paper addresses input-specific robustness certification, a refinement of the randomized smoothing technique that the main paper analyzes and improves upon.
